findings.title: Insecure Contribution Phase (PCR)
findings.description: Migrate critical configurations and functionality into the program's codebase to reduce external dependencies and enhance self-sufficiency.

findings.title: Lack of Check in Contribute Function (PCR)
findings.description: Implement additional controls within the `contribute` function to prevent new contributions during the claiming period.

findings.title: Unused Error Code (UEC)
findings.description: Review the program to determine if the error code was intended for specific authentication checks that have not been implemented.

findings.title: Unused State Variable (USV)
findings.description: Reassess the intended functionality associated with `soft_cap` and implement appropriate logic or remove it to avoid confusion.
